short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a browser extension to seamlessly send links from your desktop browser to the Cloudsurf mobile application with just one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cloudsurf Extension for Chrome - The best way to share links from desktop to mobile

When you are browsing on Chrome and find a link that is worth sharing, saving, or sending, the Cloudsurf Extension allows you to seamlessly send that link to your Cloudsurf mobile app. 

A social networking mobile application, Cloudsurf  is the best way to share, discover, and save links curated by the people who know you best. 

Extension features:
*Login to your Cloudsurf profile
*One click sending of any link from desktop to mobile app
